0.user_question: Pancho walks 20 miles a day. Except on weekends when he walks 10 miles. How many miles does he walk in a week?

ost_step.1: During the week (Monday to Friday), Pancho walks for 5 days at a rate of 20 miles per day.
ost_step.2: So in total he walked 20 * 5 = 100 miles during the weekdays.
ost_step.3: On weekends (Saturday and Sunday) Pancho walks for 2 days at a rate of 10 miles per day.

direct_answer.text: So in total he walked 100 + 20 = 120 miles during the week. The answer is: 120.
